posts.title: Grocery Shopping
posts.desc: Buy fruits, vegetables, milk, and bread.

posts.title: Doctor Appointment
posts.desc: Annual check-up at Dr. Smith's office. Need to discuss the recent blood test results and get a prescription for the new medication. Also, inquire about the recommended diet and exercise regimen to improve overall health.

posts.title: Birthday Party
posts.desc: Plan a surprise party for Sarah's birthday. Make a guest list, send out invitations, and decide on the menu. Don't forget to order the cake and buy decorations. Plan some fun activities and games to keep the guests entertained.

posts.title: Workout Routine
posts.desc: Update my gym workout routine for better results. Focus on increasing strength and endurance. Include a mix of cardio, weight training, and flexibility exercises. Track progress and make adjustments as needed.

posts.title: Read New Book
posts.desc: Start reading 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald.

posts.title: Work on Blog
posts.desc: Write a new post about healthy eating habits. Research the latest trends in nutrition and gather reliable sources. Create an outline and write a draft. Edit the post for clarity and conciseness before publishing.

posts.title: Fix Bicycle
posts.desc: Repair the flat tire on my bicycle. Check for any other damages and perform routine maintenance. Lubricate the chain and adjust the brakes for a smoother ride.

posts.title: Weekend Getaway
posts.desc: Plan a weekend trip to the mountains. Research potential destinations and accommodations. Make a list of activities to do and places to visit. Pack appropriate clothing and gear for hiking and camping.

posts.title: Monthly Budget
posts.desc: Review and adjust my monthly budget for savings. Analyze spending habits and identify areas to cut costs. Set financial goals and create a plan to achieve them. Track expenses and savings regularly to stay on track.

posts.desc: why I can't change only title
